lines:
20 November, 1911.

rrer de drevom os

MI. S. . Luk, 
224 North Tayne St.,

Angola, Ind.

18 syaASS 
bastog

o 980 M 
VItro 97 cette boog ESTOY of pittreert daom spot freedom 
"ESTOY a gam ov nom nood ou balg ayswis me I bovisser 
esse me I iw taometne Istosge to be soy tadt xow so

om teoretat 
tot eye was set ym rozeve ter smo se ayod sro 
webvodotojo od te troy ears gana eIdeenet wastisst as I 
Is for ws net oa vero VOYOY BE meqs at : ils 10

w s o vetrod tam ow teod on+ 10% tro att ytrestove Irow 
mesls avstedt Basso ed 40 woby a overed Srom agod toy been 
pidst boto aovleanog stupas its rtw sov ter osa me I 548 09816 
-orta eo I eget toebro doorsteg bas won e toode signed

tad saregase mi to od 1990 i dom for Intw sov tedt ogor vlereo 
teorseb ans of saod mort brow stinkteb soa vieron prow soy torty

-alb togtmoment Attw I low at tre tset as Ertw me soy os 
y gwoud aasg ot asofas to ono V .Boreduserer bre bogeno 
aistri seori sost: sw as vino aovtr tomt amtt te afsobnom 
from Teet avauso voy a ob oog suso bas plotsoa

aysuis ac or o certe tw teed M
raw: 20 November, 1911. rrer de drevom os MI. S. . Luk, 224 North Tayne St., Angola, Ind. 18 syaASS bastog o 980 M VItro 97 cette boog ESTOY of pittreert daom spot freedom "ESTOY a gam ov nom nood ou balg ayswis me I bovisser esse me I iw taometne Istosge to be soy tadt xow so om teoretat tot eye was set ym rozeve ter smo se ayod sro webvodotojo od te troy ears gana eIdeenet wastisst as I Is for ws net oa vero VOYOY BE meqs at : ils 10 w s o vetrod tam ow teod on+ 10% tro att ytrestove Irow mesls avstedt Basso ed 40 woby a overed Srom agod toy been pidst boto aovleanog stupas its rtw sov ter osa me I 548 09816 -orta eo I eget toebro doorsteg bas won e toode signed tad saregase mi to od 1990 i dom for Intw sov tedt ogor vlereo teorseb ans of saod mort brow stinkteb soa vieron prow soy torty -alb togtmoment Attw I low at tre tset as Ertw me soy os y gwoud aasg ot asofas to ono V .Boreduserer bre bogeno aistri seori sost: sw as vino aovtr tomt amtt te afsobnom from Teet avauso voy a ob oog suso bas plotsoa aysuis ac or o certe tw teed M

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter expressing support to Luk and the hope that he will hear from his dearest ones soon and that the suspense will end soon. Stearns says not to be disheartened, and that trials such as these should be faced squarely.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
